Facial Recognition and Government 📷

Aug 25, 2021

  • civictech
  • episode
  • public policy
  • facial recognition
  • government
  • legislation

Ryan Koch talks facial recognition technology and its role in government. We’ll chat through what it’s all about, some action happening in the policy space, and why this topic is salient.
